items.sentence: Tom and Mary don\'t eat out as often as they used to.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t see what was happening.
Tom doesn\'t have to do anything he doesn\'t want to.
I\'ve come to warn you about what\'s going to happen.
How do you know that light travels faster than sound?
I ate about half of it and left the rest on my plate.
I began to be afraid you would never come back again.
Are you going to go to Tom\'s concert tomorrow night?
Did you know you are stronger than you think you are?
I like pinto beans, but I don\'t eat them very often.
